pros: Advanced Formula with Ophiopogon seed, Cactus stem, Sophora Flavoscent, and Myristoyl Pentapeptide-4.
Stimulating the anagen phase to promote longer, fuller, healthier-looking lashes.
Vegan and cruelty-free, free of prostaglandin, fragrance, hormones, and parabens.
Manufactured in the USA in a cGMP-certified and FDA-registered facility.
Economic with free shipping depending on the package one chooses.
Very popular for its effectiveness by many customers.
Award-winning formula infused with vitamins, peptides, amino acids, and hyaluronic acid.
Suitable for contact lens wearers and lash extensions.
Designed to show results within 4-6 weeks.
cons: Some users might experience mild irritation or discomfort.
Higher price point compared to other lash serums.

pros: Natural, certified cruelty-free, gluten-free, paraben-free, organic option.
Herbal extracts to combat lash hair loss.
Contains a unique Phyto-Medic complex that may condition for longer, thicker, and stronger lashes.
cons: Low satisfaction rates due to no money-back guarantee involved.

pros: Attractive packaging; available everywhere around the world.
Made to stimulate hair roots for long and thick lashes.

cons: Manufacturing Concerns: Manufacturing in China raises a number of safety and effectiveness concerns.

pros: Safe and effective, but with an eye-catching design.
It accelerates natural lash growth, therefore strengthening from the root.
Claimed that there are no side effects reported.
cons: The presence of Propylene Glycol, which can provoke irritation and allergic reaction, is a minus.
